text: The Good Liar is a 2019 American crime thriller movie directed and produced by Bill Condon and written by Jeffrey Hatcher. It is based on the novel of the same name by Nicholas Searle. It stars Ian McKellen as a career con artist who meets a rich widow (Helen Mirren) online, and then discovers that his plan to steal her fortune has some surprising difficulty. The movie was released in the United States on November 15, 2019. It received mixed reviews from critics and made $33 million on a budget of $10 million. ==References== Category:2019 crime thriller movies Category:2010s American crime thriller movies Category:British crime thriller movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Bill Condon Category:Movies set in Germany
